llm.feedback:
Remove the parentheses after the probability in each line, keep the probability as a plain number with a percent sign, and ensure every line is a single line with no extra text after the probability. Keep citations only in the Driver/Mechanism and What to watch fields (e.g., “AI‑driven tech demand expansion (H86O3XRUJ)”). Shorten the driver phrases if they exceed one clause (e.g., “EPAM AI platform roll‑out” instead of “EPAM AI platform roll‑out & client expansion”) and keep the watch phrases concise (e.g., “EPAM Q3 earnings, AI adoption metrics (H86O3XRUJ)(KNWKYIQ1W)”). After these edits the four lines should read:  

Up | 2025‑Q3 to 2028‑Q4 | AI‑driven tech demand expansion (H86O3XRUJ) | S&P 500 earnings, AI adoption metrics (H86O3XRUJ) | 65%  
Up | 2025‑Q3 to 2028‑Q4 | EPAM AI platform roll‑out (H86O3XRUJ)(KNWKYIQ1W) | EPAM Q3 earnings, AI adoption metrics (H86O3XRUJ)(KNWKYIQ1W) | 70%  
Down | 2025‑Q3 to 2026‑Q2 | Mastercard regulatory scrutiny tightening (HHKTQ3JYH) | Regulatory announcements, cost pressure indicators (HHKTQ3JYH) | 30%  
Down | 2025‑Q3 to 2026‑Q2 | Climate litigation surge (ZV3QI3K19) | Litigation filings, VIX spikes (ZV3QI3K19) | 25%
